mapper.select: SELECT * from GHT_CONT where CONTRACT_ID=#{CONTRACT_ID}

select gf.FROOM_TITLE, case when gc.SETT_DATE is null then '입실' else '퇴실' end inRoom, substr(gc.START_DATE,1,10) STDATE,substr(gc.END_DATE,1,10) EDDATE, gc.* from GHT_CONT gc left join GHT_FROOM gf on gf.FROOM_ID = gc.FROOM_ID
select gc.CONTRACT_ID , gc.START_DATE, gc.END_DATE, gc.FROOM_ID, gf.FROOM_TITLE from GHT_CONT gc left join GHT_FROOM gf on gf.FROOM_ID = gc.FROOM_ID where SETT_DATE is NULL group by gc.FROOM_ID
SELECT * from GHT_ALTAR where ALTAR_CAT IN (102,103) and ALTAR_USE_YN = 'Y' order by ALTAR_CAT
SELECT a.*, b.CONTRACT_ID from GHT_FROOM a left join GHT_CONT b on a.FROOM_ID = b.FROOM_ID and b.SETT_DATE is null where a.FROOM_TYP=1 and a.FROOM_USE_YN='Y' group by a.FROOM_ID

SELECT a.*, b.CONTRACT_ID from GHT_FROOM a left join GHT_CONT b on a.FROOM_ID = b.FROOM_ID and b.SETT_DATE is null where a.FROOM_TYP=1 and a.FROOM_USE_YN='Y' and b.CONTRACT_ID is null group by a.FROOM_ID
SELECT COUNT(CONTRACT_ID) from GHT_CONT where END_DATE >= #{START_DATE} and FROOM_ID = #{FROOM_ID}
select gbc.BCD_TITLE , gf.* from GHT_FTABLE gf left join GHT_BASE_CODE gbc on gbc.BCD_ID = gf.FTABLE_CAT where FTABLE_CAT IN (24,31,32,34,35,36,72,73,74,75,77,76)
select * from GHT_FROOM where FROOM_TYP != 1 and FROOM_USE_YN = 'Y' and FROOM_TYP != 5
select * from GHT_FROOM where FROOM_TYP != 1 and FROOM_USE_YN = 'Y' and FROOM_TYP = 5

select b.CAT_TITLE, a.*, c.FNRS_GOODS_INIT_QTY, c.FNRS_GOODS_ADD_QTY, d.BCD_TITLE from GHT_GOODS a left join GHT_CAT_02 b on b.CAT_ID = a.CAT_02_ID left join GHT_FNRSUPP_ORD c on a.GOODS_ID = c.FNRS_GOODS_ID and c.FNRS_ORD_FROOM_ID = 121 left join GHT_BASE_CODE d on c.FNRS_ORD_FROOM_ID = d.BCD_ID where CAT_02_ID in (select CAT_ID from GHT_CAT_02 where CAT_01 ='1') and GOODS_USE_YN = 'Y' and (GOODS_MODERN = '121' or GOODS_MODERN = '123') and a.CAT_02_ID not in (13,14,15,16,17,18) order by CAT_02_ID, GOODS_ORDER

select b.CAT_TITLE, a.*, c.FNRS_GOODS_INIT_QTY, c.FNRS_GOODS_ADD_QTY, d.BCD_TITLE from GHT_GOODS a left join GHT_CAT_02 b on b.CAT_ID = a.CAT_02_ID left join GHT_FNRSUPP_ORD c on a.GOODS_ID = c.FNRS_GOODS_ID and c.FNRS_ORD_FROOM_ID = 121 left join GHT_BASE_CODE d on c.FNRS_ORD_FROOM_ID = d.BCD_ID where CAT_02_ID in (select CAT_ID from GHT_CAT_02 where CAT_01 ='1') and GOODS_USE_YN = 'Y' and (GOODS_MODERN = '121' or GOODS_MODERN = '123') and a.CAT_02_ID = #{CAT_02_ID} order by CAT_02_ID, GOODS_ORDER

select b.CAT_TITLE, a.*, c.FNRS_GOODS_INIT_QTY, c.FNRS_GOODS_ADD_QTY, d.BCD_TITLE from GHT_GOODS a left join GHT_CAT_02 b on b.CAT_ID = a.CAT_02_ID left join GHT_FNRSUPP_ORD c on a.GOODS_ID = c.FNRS_GOODS_ID and c.FNRS_ORD_FROOM_ID = 121 left join GHT_BASE_CODE d on c.FNRS_ORD_FROOM_ID = d.BCD_ID where CAT_02_ID in (select CAT_ID from GHT_CAT_02 where CAT_01 ='1') and GOODS_USE_YN = 'Y' and (GOODS_MODERN = '122' or GOODS_MODERN = '123') and a.CAT_02_ID not in (13,14,15,16,17,18) order by CAT_02_ID, GOODS_ORDER

select b.CAT_TITLE, a.*, c.FNRS_GOODS_INIT_QTY, c.FNRS_GOODS_ADD_QTY, d.BCD_TITLE from GHT_GOODS a left join GHT_CAT_02 b on b.CAT_ID = a.CAT_02_ID left join GHT_FNRSUPP_ORD c on a.GOODS_ID = c.FNRS_GOODS_ID and c.FNRS_ORD_FROOM_ID = 121 left join GHT_BASE_CODE d on c.FNRS_ORD_FROOM_ID = d.BCD_ID where CAT_02_ID in (select CAT_ID from GHT_CAT_02 where CAT_01 ='1') and GOODS_USE_YN = 'Y' and (GOODS_MODERN = '122' or GOODS_MODERN = '123') and a.CAT_02_ID = #{CAT_02_ID} order by CAT_02_ID, GOODS_ORDER

select b.CAT_TITLE, a.*, c.MESSR_GOODS_INIT_QTY, c.MESSR_GOODS_ADD_QTY, d.BCD_TITLE from GHT_GOODS a left join GHT_CAT_02 b on b.CAT_ID = a.CAT_02_ID left join GHT_MESSR_ORD c on a.GOODS_ID = c.MESSR_GOODS_ID and c.MESSR_ORD_FROOM_ID = #{CONT_FROOM_ID} left join GHT_BASE_CODE d on c.MESSR_ORD_FROOM_ID = d.BCD_ID where CAT_02_ID in (select CAT_ID from GHT_CAT_02 where CAT_01 ='2') and GOODS_USE_YN = 'Y' and GOODS_INIT_ORDER = 'Y' and MESSR_GOODS_INIT_QTY > 0 order by CAT_02_ID, GOODS_ORDER

select b.CAT_TITLE, a.*, c.MESSR_GOODS_INIT_QTY, c.MESSR_GOODS_ADD_QTY, d.BCD_TITLE from GHT_GOODS a left join GHT_CAT_02 b on b.CAT_ID = a.CAT_02_ID left join GHT_MESSR_ORD c on a.GOODS_ID = c.MESSR_GOODS_ID and c.MESSR_ORD_FROOM_ID = #{CONT_FROOM_ID} left join GHT_BASE_CODE d on c.MESSR_ORD_FROOM_ID = d.BCD_ID where CAT_02_ID in (select CAT_ID from GHT_CAT_02 where CAT_01 ='2') and GOODS_USE_YN = 'Y' and GOODS_INIT_ORDER = 'Y' and MESSR_GOODS_INIT_QTY > 0 and GOODS_FROOM_ORDER = 'Y' order by CAT_02_ID, GOODS_ORDER

select b.CAT_TITLE, a.*, c.STORE_GOODS_INIT_QTY, c.STORE_GOODS_ADD_QTY, d.BCD_ID from GHT_GOODS a left join GHT_CAT_02 b on b.CAT_ID = a.CAT_02_ID left join GHT_STORE_ORD c on a.GOODS_ID = c.STORE_GOODS_ID and c.STORE_ORD_FROOM_ID = #{CONT_FROOM_ID} left join GHT_BASE_CODE d on c.STORE_ORD_FROOM_ID = d.BCD_ID where CAT_02_ID in (select CAT_ID from GHT_CAT_02 where CAT_01 ='3') and GOODS_USE_YN = 'Y' and GOODS_INIT_ORDER = 'Y' and STORE_GOODS_INIT_QTY > 0 order by CAT_02_ID, GOODS_ORDER

select b.CAT_TITLE, a.*, c.STORE_GOODS_INIT_QTY, c.STORE_GOODS_ADD_QTY, d.BCD_ID from GHT_GOODS a left join GHT_CAT_02 b on b.CAT_ID = a.CAT_02_ID left join GHT_STORE_ORD c on a.GOODS_ID = c.STORE_GOODS_ID and c.STORE_ORD_FROOM_ID = #{CONT_FROOM_ID} left join GHT_BASE_CODE d on c.STORE_ORD_FROOM_ID = d.BCD_ID where CAT_02_ID in (select CAT_ID from GHT_CAT_02 where CAT_01 ='3') and GOODS_USE_YN = 'Y' and GOODS_INIT_ORDER = 'Y' and STORE_GOODS_INIT_QTY > 0 and GOODS_FROOM_ORDER = 'Y' order by CAT_02_ID, GOODS_ORDER
select * from GHT_CONSULT_RENTFEE where CONSULT_ID = #{CONSULT_ID}
mapper.insert:
update GHT_SETL_RULE SET MOD_DATE = now() where SETL_FROOM_ID = #{SETL_FROOM_ID};
insert into GHT_SETL_RULE ( SETL_FROOM_ID, SETL_TITLE, SETL_REMARK, SETL_USE_YN, REG_DATE ) values ( #{SETL_FROOM_ID}, #{SETL_TITLE}, #{SETL_REMARK}, #{SETL_USE_YN}, now() );
mapper.update: update GHT_SETL_RULE SET MOD_DATE = now() where SETL_FROOM_ID = #{SETL_FROOM_ID}
mapper.insert: insert into GHT_CONSULT_RENTFEE (CONSULT_ID, RENT_TITLE, RENT_TYPE, RENT_NAME, CHARGE_TYPE, CHARGE_YN, CHARGE_PERDAY, CHARGE_PERHOUR, RENT_DAYS, RENT_HOURS, RENT_AMOUNT) values (#{CONSULT_ID}, #{RENT_TITLE}, #{RENT_TYPE}, #{RENT_NAME}, #{CHARGE_TYPE}, #{CHARGE_YN}, #{CHARGE_PERDAY}, #{CHARGE_PERHOUR}, #{RENT_DAYS}, #{RENT_HOURS}, #{RENT_AMOUNT})
mapper.update: update GHT_CONT_FROOM set MOD_DATE = now() where CONTRACT_ID = #{CONTRACT_ID} and FROOM_ID not in (select froom_id from GHT_FROOM where FROOM_TYP = '5')
update GHT_FTAB_ORDERSHEET set MOD_DATE = now() where CONTRACT_ID = #{CONTRACT_ID}
update GHT_FNRSUPP_ORDERSHEET set MOD_DATE = now() where CONTRACT_ID = #{CONTRACT_ID}
update GHT_ALTAR_ORDERSHEET set MOD_DATE = now() where CONTRACT_ID = #{CONTRACT_ID}
update GHT_REST_ORDERSHEET set MOD_DATE = now() where CONTRACT_ID = #{CONTRACT_ID} and ORD_TYPE = '1'
update GHT_STORE_ORDSHEET set MOD_DATE = now() where CONTRACT_ID = #{CONTRACT_ID} and ORD_TYPE = '1'
update GHT_CONT_FROOM set MOD_DATE = now() where CONTRACT_ID = #{CONTRACT_ID} and FROOM_ID in (select froom_id from GHT_FROOM where FROOM_TYP = '5')

update GHT_CONSULT_RENTFEE set RENT_TITLE, RENT_TYPE, RENT_NAME, CHARGE_TYPE, CHARGE_YN, CHARGE_PERDAY, CHARGE_PERHOUR, RENT_DAYS, RENT_HOURS, RENT_AMOUNT where RENT_ID = #{RENT_ID} and CONSULT_ID = #{CONSULT_ID}
mapper.insert: update GHT_CONT_SANGJU set MOD_DATE = now() where CONT_SANGJU_ID = #{CONT_SANGJU_ID}
mapper.select: SELECT CONTRACT_ID from GHT_CONT where FROOM_ID = #{FROOM_ID} and #{NOWDATE} between START_DATE and END_DATE

select b.DAYS, b.TIMEs, b.RCHARGE, a.*, CASE WHEN IFNULL(b.RCHARGE,0)>0 then 'Y' else 'N' end CHKED from GHT_FROOM a left join GHT_CONT_FROOM b on a.FROOM_ID = b.FROOM_ID and b.CONTRACT_ID = #{CONTRACT_ID} and b.MOD_DATE is NULL where a.FROOM_TYP = 1 and a.FROOM_USE_YN = 'Y'

select gfo.QUTY,gfo.ORD_AMOUNT, gbc.BCD_TITLE, gf.*, CASE WHEN IFNULL(gfo.ORD_AMOUNT,0)>0 then 'Y' else 'N' end CHKED from GHT_FTABLE gf left join GHT_BASE_CODE gbc on gbc.BCD_ID = gf.FTABLE_CAT left join GHT_FTAB_ORDERSHEET gfo on gfo.FTABLE_CODE = gf.FTABLE_ID and CONTRACT_ID = #{CONTRACT_ID} and gfo.MOD_DATE is NULL where FTABLE_CAT IN (24,31,32,34,35,36,72,73,74,75,77,76) order by FTABLE_CAT

select e.ORD_QUTY , e.ORD_AMOUNT , b.CAT_TITLE, a.*, c.FNRS_GOODS_INIT_QTY, c.FNRS_GOODS_ADD_QTY, d.BCD_TITLE from GHT_GOODS a left join GHT_CAT_02 b on b.CAT_ID = a.CAT_02_ID left join GHT_FNRSUPP_ORD c on a.GOODS_ID = c.FNRS_GOODS_ID and c.FNRS_ORD_FROOM_ID = 121 left join GHT_BASE_CODE d on c.FNRS_ORD_FROOM_ID = d.BCD_ID left join GHT_FNRSUPP_ORDERSHEET e on a.GOODS_ID = e.GOODS_CODE and e.CONTRACT_ID = #{CONTRACT_ID} and e.MOD_DATE IS NULL where CAT_02_ID in (select CAT_ID from GHT_CAT_02 where CAT_01 ='1') and GOODS_USE_YN = 'Y' and (GOODS_MODERN = '121' or GOODS_MODERN = '123') order by CAT_02_ID, GOODS_ORDER

select e.ORD_QUTY , e.ORD_AMOUNT , b.CAT_TITLE, a.*, c.FNRS_GOODS_INIT_QTY, c.FNRS_GOODS_ADD_QTY, d.BCD_TITLE from GHT_GOODS a left join GHT_CAT_02 b on b.CAT_ID = a.CAT_02_ID left join GHT_FNRSUPP_ORD c on a.GOODS_ID = c.FNRS_GOODS_ID and c.FNRS_ORD_FROOM_ID = 121 left join GHT_BASE_CODE d on c.FNRS_ORD_FROOM_ID = d.BCD_ID left join GHT_FNRSUPP_ORDERSHEET e on a.GOODS_ID = e.GOODS_CODE and e.CONTRACT_ID = #{CONTRACT_ID} and e.MOD_DATE IS NULL where CAT_02_ID in (select CAT_ID from GHT_CAT_02 where CAT_01 ='1') and GOODS_USE_YN = 'Y' and (GOODS_MODERN = '122' or GOODS_MODERN = '123') order by CAT_02_ID, GOODS_ORDER

SELECT b.QUTY ,b.ORD_PRICE ,a.*, CASE WHEN IFNULL(b.ORD_PRICE,0)>0 then 'Y' else 'N' end CHKED from GHT_ALTAR a left join GHT_ALTAR_ORDERSHEET b on a.ALTAR_ID = b.ALTAR_ID and b.CONTRACT_ID = #{CONTRACT_ID} and b.MOD_DATE is NULL where a.ALTAR_CAT IN (102,103) and a.ALTAR_USE_YN = 'Y' order by a.ALTAR_CAT

select e.ORD_QUTY , e.ORD_AMOUNT , b.CAT_TITLE, a.*, c.MESSR_GOODS_INIT_QTY, c.MESSR_GOODS_ADD_QTY, d.BCD_TITLE from GHT_GOODS a left join GHT_CAT_02 b on b.CAT_ID = a.CAT_02_ID left join GHT_MESSR_ORD c on a.GOODS_ID = c.MESSR_GOODS_ID and c.MESSR_ORD_FROOM_ID = #{CONT_FROOM_ID} left join GHT_BASE_CODE d on c.MESSR_ORD_FROOM_ID = d.BCD_ID left join GHT_REST_ORDERSHEET e on e.GOODS_CODE = a.GOODS_ID and e.CONTRACT_ID = #{CONTRACT_ID} and e.MOD_DATE IS NULL where a.CAT_02_ID in (select CAT_ID from GHT_CAT_02 where CAT_01 ='2') and a.GOODS_USE_YN = 'Y' and a.GOODS_INIT_ORDER = 'Y' and c.MESSR_GOODS_INIT_QTY > 0 order by a.CAT_02_ID, a.GOODS_ORDER

select e.ORD_QUTY, e.ORD_AMOUNT, b.CAT_TITLE , a.* ,c.STORE_GOODS_INIT_QTY, c.STORE_GOODS_ADD_QTY, d.BCD_ID from GHT_GOODS a left join GHT_CAT_02 b on b.CAT_ID = a.CAT_02_ID left join GHT_STORE_ORD c on a.GOODS_ID = c.STORE_GOODS_ID and c.STORE_ORD_FROOM_ID = #{CONT_FROOM_ID} left join GHT_BASE_CODE d on c.STORE_ORD_FROOM_ID = d.BCD_ID left join GHT_STORE_ORDSHEET e on e.GOODS_CODE = a.GOODS_ID and e.MOD_DATE IS NULL and e.CONTRACT_ID = #{CONTRACT_ID} where a.CAT_02_ID in (select CAT_ID from GHT_CAT_02 where CAT_01 ='3') and a.GOODS_USE_YN = 'Y' and a.GOODS_INIT_ORDER = 'Y' and c.STORE_GOODS_INIT_QTY > 0 order by a.CAT_02_ID, a.GOODS_ORDER
SELECT * FROM GHT_ETC_ORDERSHEET where CONTRACT_ID = #{CONTRACT_ID} and MOD_DATE IS NULL
SELECT * FROM GHT_CONT_CFN where CONTRACT_ID = #{CONTRACT_ID} and MOD_DATE IS NULL
SELECT * FROM GHT_CONT_SANGJU where CONTRACT_ID = #{CONTRACT_ID} and MOD_DATE IS NULL
